Class ButtonInput<TButton>

Namespace
osu.Framework.Input.StateChanges
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

An abstract base class of an IInput which denotes a list of button state changes (pressed or released).

public abstract class ButtonInput<TButton> : IInput where TButton : struct

Type Parameters

TButton

The type of button.

ButtonInput(TButton, bool)

Creates a ButtonInput<TButton> with a single TButton state.

protected ButtonInput(TButton button, bool isPressed)

Parameters

button TButton

The TButton to add.

isPressed bool

The state of button.

ButtonInput(ButtonStates<TButton>?, ButtonStates<TButton>?)

Creates a ButtonInput<TButton> from the difference of two ButtonStates<TButton>.

protected ButtonInput(ButtonStates<TButton>? current, ButtonStates<TButton>? previous)

Parameters

current ButtonStates<TButton>

The newer ButtonStates<TButton>.

previous ButtonStates<TButton>

The older ButtonStates<TButton>.

Remarks

Buttons that are pressed in previous and not pressed in current will be listed as Released. Buttons that are not pressed in previous and pressed in current will be listed as Pressed.
